basics.name: ICS 496 - Spring 2025 - Transcribing Historical Documents using Artificial Intelligence
basics.label: Information and Computer Science
basics.summary: This page will track the progress and milestones for the ICS 496 group project.  In General, the project's goal is to utilize Artificial Intellegnece and Machine Learning models to accurately transcribe historical, handwritten documentation

highlights: Lead a team of engineers through the install, and maintenance of various equipment
Curriculum Development for training and certification evolutions
Responsible for Safe Navigation of a Submarine through 2 Western Pacific Deployments
Mentor, train and certify a department of 35 personnel in IT, Navigation and Communications Principles.

awards.title: Navy-Marine Corps Commendation Medal
awards.summary: For leading a department of 35 Engineering Technician and IT personnel through 2 successful deployments.
